concept.title: Quality of service and message persistence
concept.shortdesc: There are three qualities of service for delivering publications: "at most once", "at least once" and "exactly once".

conbody.p: Publication messages are made persistent if they are sent with a quality of service of "at least once", or "exactly once". Persistent data is stored in the message store within the messaging hub.
For more information about quality of service and persistence, see Qualities of service.
